entry.title: The Micro Everywhere Bag in Jet Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Accessories
Price: 20.00

The smallest addition to our Everywhere Bag lineup, the Micro Everywhere Bag is designed to fit small items like earbuds and credit cards. Loop it onto your suitcase or bag, attach your keys to the metal clip, or use it as an accessory pouch.

entry.title: Active Tote 45L in Jet Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 60.00

Made from a lightweight, high-strength polyester, this versatile 45L Tote packs a day's worth of travel essentials. A top cinch closure adjusts to how much you pack, while an exterior and interior pocket system organizes your phone, passport, and other valuables within reach.

Made from 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant Dual Action fabric, our Active Collection is designed to protect your belongings from the elements—whether you’re staying local or going off the grid.

entry.title: The Packable Sling Bag in Cayenne
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 18.00

This Packable Sling Bag will hold your wallet, keys, sunscreen, snacks—basically, anything you need close at hand. With the option to pack it down into a compact zip pouch or expand it and wear it around your waist, this lightweight sling bag can easily be stored in any Away suitcase or bag for added versatility and mobility wherever your travels take you.

entry.title: The Everywhere Sling Bag in Coast Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 22.50

Go hands-free with The Everywhere Sling Bag, designed for all your on-the-go essentials. It features two main compartments and two interior pockets, plus an easy access back pocket for your phone or passport—all while fitting comfortably across your body.

entry.title: The Sleep Mask in Navy Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Accessories
Price: 13.50

Extra soft and super sleek, The Sleep Mask features a molded interior shape that gives your eyes plenty of room. It includes a hidden pocket for easy ear plug storage, and folds into itself for easy packing.

Additionally, our fabric uses 37.5® thermoregulating technology to personalize climate control. If you get hot, 37.5 active particles help to cool you down. If you get cold, these same particles work to warm you up.

entry.title: Active Duffle 55L in Vivid Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 65.00

The 55L travel duffle is the medium-sized bag in the Active collection that holds a week's worth of gear. Made from a lightweight, high-strength polyester, this bag features our unique compression system that helps you pack more in and convertible padded straps that allow you to conveniently transport the duffle like a backpack for longer distances.

Made from 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant Dual Action fabric, our Active Collection is designed to protect your belongings from the elements—whether you’re staying local or going off the grid.

entry.title: Active Duffle 70L in Burgundy Red
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 80.00

The 70L travel duffle is the largest bag in the Active collection and holds a checked suitcase amount of gear for week-long-plus excursions. Made from a lightweight, high-strength polyester, this bag features our unique compression system that helps you pack more in and convertible padded straps that allow you to conveniently transport the duffle like a backpack for longer distances.

Made from 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant Dual Action fabric, our Active Collection is designed to protect your belongings from the elements—whether you’re staying local or going off the grid.
